page.title: 14Block D7 (cont)
page.content: ...The park is also the home of a picnic area for the senior citizen's. The area was constructed by pupils of the Gwendraeth High School,Pontyberem now defunct after its absorption into the comprehensive school system.On either side of the road leading from the park to Pontyberem square are the Pelican Inn now a sports club and the"Star"Inn now a private dwelling place.The southern part of the block is traversed by the B4317 road.A few yards from the square stands St.Johns Church,the more modern of the two Anglican Churches in the area_the other being Capel Ifan_a Norman Chapel of ease! New Road which runs from the square to Pontyberem station is the main shopping area of the village.It houses the British Legion Club,the Welfare Hall which contains the ....
